description: This file defines the 'RoomRepository' interface which extends JpaRepository for managing Room entities in the backend. It includes methods for finding a room by its room code and checking existence by room code, serving as a data access layer component.

classes.name: RoomRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Room entities, providing custom methods to find and check existence of rooms by room code.

methods.name: findByRoomCode
methods.description: Retrieves an Optional containing the Room entity with the specified roomCode, if it exists.

methods.name: existsByRoomCode
methods.description: Checks if a Room with the given roomCode exists in the database.
